title: The Human body: how it works
brief_description: Designed for primary students in Years 5 and 6, this is an introduction to the component parts of the human body; how these parts interact and are interdependent. Short segments explain the skeleton, muscles, nerves, brain, blood, heart, digestive system, waste disposal and the lungs. A Teacher’s Guide suggests follow-up activities and discussion questions for use in the classroom.
